Uses of Interface
pythagoras.d.IPlane

Packages that use IPlane
pythagoras.d The Pythagoras geometry utility classes specialized on double. 
 

Uses of IPlane in pythagoras.d
 

Classes in pythagoras.d that implement IPlane
 class Plane
          A plane consisting of a unit normal and a constant.
 

Methods in pythagoras.d with parameters of type IPlane
 Matrix4 Matrix4.setToReflection(IPlane plane)
          Sets this to a reflection across the specified plane.
 Matrix4 Matrix4.setToSkew(IPlane plane, IVector3 amount)
          Sets this to a skew by the specified amount relative to the given plane.
